title: Morningstar
content:
ation: The Hollow (Druid Grove). Quest: Crafting: Dropped by:

Morningstar can be purchased from:

Dammon, at The Hollow (Druid Grove). Roah Moonglow, at Shattered Sanctum

Morningstar Notes & Tips

Not all items will be sold at the same time. Leveling up or completing a Long Rest will reset the shop and potenially show different Items. Rarity: Common Value: 50 Gp. Weight: 1.8 Kg. ID: WPN_Morningstar

Weapons Adamantine Longsword ♦ Adamantine Mace ♦ Adamantine Scimitar ♦ Air Myrmidon Flail ♦ All
